title: Upsurge RunDownMid [ Plat 4+ ONLY ] [ALL LANES] Coached by TyZ [ Former CS Coach + Unviresty Coach ]
body:
Hello, I am TyZ.. I have recently took the job as Head Coach for the Upsurge Teir 1 [ Challenger Series Team ]. 

My Background:
1. I coached for University for 2 years before focusing on school instead. 
2. Coached a Challenger Series team "Team Wicked" which got DQ for three of our players having PRs and not VISA's.
3. Coached individual play for many D3+ players for NA and LAN

What I would be focusing on for this team;
I generally would like to find a solid 7 man team with "5 starters and 2 subs" for competitions and helping you progress 
towards Diamond/Master, I am a stategic coach, so I work with macro / micro play more than anything.. I don't care enough to look at
"Who warded the most".. I am completely honest with my feedback on each game, and I expect players to be competitive and work with me throughout
this summer to become the best you can with your abilities. 

I've coached Plat players/teams before and ended with 2 of them high diamond and others mid diamond. [ Only 2 months of work ].
We will have a tight schedule and practice three times a week and 2 days of solo q ranking.. 1 day of VOD coverage

Application;
Name [ RL ]:
IGN:
Role:
Rank:
Discord App: Yes / No
Time Zone:
Work / College :
Stream : Yes / No

Add me IG once you've made your application.

Thank you for reading this long post ! 
TyZ

I ended up not being apart of the team due to internal conflicts and wish to join a new team, I'm going to start soloing again and get to diamond pretty soon. I wanted to find a team that actually has a coach and practice more than a hour each week.
